preference.name: MEAlignmentCheckReportStylesheet
preference.preference_description: Contains the name of the Microsoft Excel style sheet on which the EBOM-MBOM alignment check report is based. A default style sheet is provided, but you can supply a custom style sheet if necessary. Valid Values: A single character string that contains the name of an existing Microsoft Excel style sheet.
